mapper.update:
UPDATE contract_item
contract_id = #{contractId},
order_code = #{orderCode},
user_id = #{userId},
merchant_product_id = #{merchantProductId},
merchant_product_name = #{merchantProductName},
merchant_product_standard = #{merchantProductStandard},
merchant_product_material = #{merchantProductMaterial},
merchant_product_place_of_origin = #{merchantProductPlaceOfOrigin},
merchant_product_item_amount = #{merchantProductItemAmount},
merchant_product_price_final = #{merchantProductPriceFinal},
merchant_product_remark = #{merchantProductRemark},
merchant_product_item_num = #{merchantProductItemNum},
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
contract_code = #{contractCode},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
sku_id = #{skuId},
WHERE id = #{id}
